review: So far has worked fine.. easy set up
author: J. Lipham

review: I have definitely gotten my money's worth from this product. The only thing is that sometimes it takes awhile for my phone to sync to it.
author: ricasauce

review: This is amazing. I got it to stream my netflix, super easy to set up. Haven't had a problem with it since it was installed.
author: Lillian

review: This device performs as promised. It was easy to set up on the tv via the instructions over WIFI with your computer. We control this device mostly through our smart phones to access Netflix shows and movies.  My daughter loves showing us her favorite YouTube videos with this.
author: I love the truth

review: Just as described, speedy shipping!  Thanks
author: cjf

review: exactly what's seen on web and commercials / good article / good price
author: Fitzgerald Grant

review: Easy to set up. Works great. Just wish Amazon prime video worked on it
author: mosnow
